name: pukka
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
old-fashioned real: a nice little Italian restaurant serving pukka pizzas and pasta
slang of excellent quality: I've had some pukka food there.
extremely formal and educated: He's not one of the pukka types she usually favours.
